Reviews.Title: The company is the worst.. your taking a big risk
Reviews.Author: corbin
Reviews.Content: Why is that THL's customer service IS THE WORST I have ever experienced in my entire life.  Phone completely doesn't work.  I bought the phone about a month ago.  Haven't even had the phone for a month because the shipping took so long.  Which is fine but then after 20 days of use the phone stops working.  All I get is some person named  "Lilly Lilly"  responding to my messages once every 2 days telling me to send jpeg format.  I sent jpeg video in several different formats.  I even have a video of the issue on youtube.com.http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=73pjGeboN1IThis has been going on for weeks.  THL does not want to help or correct the issue.  All they do is say "thank you" for sending a message and hope you dont respond back.  I advise anyone NEVER TO BUY FROM THL.  There return policy is a LIE.  There customer service is a JOKE - to say the least.  I'm Laughing to hard when I think of there year warranty on there phone.  LIES LIES. The phone was cool for 20 days with jelly bean and a seemingly fast quad core.  However you are taking a RISK with quality.So I ask again,Why is that THL's customer service IS THE WORST???-PHONE DONT WORK after 20 days kids

Reviews.Title: impressive
Reviews.Author: paul andrews
Reviews.Content: Love this phone. I'm on it right now. Better than my iPhone. Very fast lots of features and unlocked. I use it with straight talk. Impressive and for 45$ a month unlimited everything you safe a whole lot of money!!!
